name: Battle Dodgeball 3
summary: Become the "Battle Ball King" in Battle Dodgeball 3, a bonus disc game released only with the Twin Battle Box, a special edition of Great Battle Fullblast, a game in the Compati Hero Series. It was released to commemorate the 20th anniversary of the Great Battle franchise. Like the other Compati Hero Series games, it prominently features characters from popular Japanese tokusatsu live-action shows and mecha anime, including Ultraman, Gundam, and Kamen Rider. The main game is a story mode that tells about a legendary dodgeball ("Battle Ball") tournament. During a time of peace, three mysterious artifacts appear from the ocean and a tournament is announced. The winner will be the one able to gather all of them and be crowned the new Battle Ball King. There is also a Super Battle League Mode, which will pit you against up to 15 different teams, or you can have practice versus matches in the Training Mode.
